title: death threat by a player
body: Hi I played with someone who flammed me in the game and he added me on league for flamming me again and make a death threat on me. It was a bad experience to play with this dude i hope he will get a ban :D

replies.body:
I'm with *Deep Terror Nami* on this one. I definitely recommend taking screenshots of these types of chats and submit them to our player behavior team through a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Every report brings players with negative or offensive behaviour one step closer to seeing justice!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Please mute players like that while in game, report them after, and block them if they try to add you. This is the best way to handle the situation, though if you must report someone for offenses outside of a game or lobby you can submit screenshots in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Just use the **I have a question > Game & Features > General Questions** category, but keep in mind that Player Support will not be able to divulge information about the player or their investigation should they do one.
